sentence.Network_cn: 建筑业不再像以往那样萧条了。

sentence.Network_en: Check the actual construction of the chair by looking underneath.
sentence.Network_cn: 看看椅子的下面，检查一下它的实际构造。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: via Old French from Latin constructio(n-), from construere 'heap together' (see construct)

entry.tran: (房屋、工厂、道路、桥梁等的)建筑，建造
entry.def: Construction is the building of things such as houses, factories, roads, and bridges.

example.ex: He'd already started construction on a hunting lodge.
example.tran: 他已经开始建造一间狩猎用的小屋。

example.ex: ...the only nuclear power station under construction in Britain.
example.tran: 英国唯一一家在建的核电站

entry.def: The construction of something such as a vehicle or machine is the making of it.

example.ex: ...companies who have long experience in the construction of those types of equipment...
example.tran: 长期从事此类设备制造的公司

example.ex: With the exception of teak, this is the finest wood for boat construction.
example.tran: 这是除柚木以外最好的造船木材。

entry.def: The construction of something such as a system is the creation of it.

example.ex: ...the construction of a just system of criminal justice.
example.tran: 一套公正的刑事审判制度的创建

entry.def: You can refer to an object that has been built or made as a construction .

example.ex: The British pavilion is an impressive steel and glass construction the size of Westminster Abbey.
example.tran: 这座英式亭阁是令人赞叹的钢和玻璃建筑，大小和威斯敏斯特教堂相当。

entry.def: You use construction to refer to the structure of something and the way it has been built or made.

example.ex: The Shakers believed that furniture should be plain, simple, useful, practical and of sound construction...
example.tran: 震颤派教徒认为家具应当朴素、简单、有用、实用，并且结构合理。

example.ex: The chairs were light in construction yet extremely strong.
example.tran: 这些椅子构造轻巧，但却极为结实。

entry.tran: (对某人言行的)解释，理解，阐释
entry.def: The construction that you put on what someone says or does is your interpretation of what it means.

example.ex: The denial was limited to rejecting the construction put on his remarks...
example.tran: 这种否认仅限于不接受对他所说话语的阐释。

example.ex: He put the wrong construction on what he saw.
example.tran: 他误解了所见到的事情。

entry.def: A grammatical construction is a particular arrangement of words in a sentence, clause, or phrase.

example.tran: 避免使用复杂的动词结构。

means.word_mean: 1. the act of constructing or building something;

sentences.sentence: "during the construction we had to take a detour"
"his hobby was the building of boats"

means.word_mean: 2. the commercial activity involved in constructing buildings;
3. a thing constructed; a complex construction or entity;

sentences.sentence: "the structure consisted of a series of arches"
"she wore her hair in an amazing construction of whirls and ribbons"

means.word_mean: 4. a group of words that form a constituent of a sentence and are considered as a single unit;

sentences.sentence: "I concluded from his awkward constructions that he was a foreigner"

means.word_mean: 5. the creation of a construct; the process of combining ideas into a congruous object of thought
6. an interpretation of a text or action;

sentences.sentence: "they put an unsympathetic construction on his conduct"

means.word_mean: 7. drawing a figure satisfying certain conditions as part of solving a problem or proving a theorem;

sentences.sentence: "the assignment was to make a construction that could be used in proving the Pythagorean theorem"

auth_sentence.content: This album sees a return to simple song construction.
auth_sentence.res_content: This album sees a return to simple song construction.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This album sees a return to simple song construction.

auth_sentence.content: We know that microbes take part in brain construction.
auth_sentence.res_content: We know that microbes take part in brain construction.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: We know that microbes take part in brain construction.

auth_sentence.content: In so doing they introduced very lengthy construction delays.
auth_sentence.res_content: In so doing they introduced very lengthy construction delays.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: In so doing they introduced very lengthy construction delays.

destruct破坏+ive……的→adj.破坏性
industry工业, 产业+ial……的→industrial
industry勤奋+ious..的→industrious
instruct[v.教,教授;命令,指示]+ive表形容词→adj.有益的, 教育性的

obstruct[v.阻隔,阻塞[道路,通道等]n.阻碍物,障碍物]+ion表名词→n.妨碍,障碍物

stems_affixes.value_cn: 建造,构造;建筑物,结构;释义,解释
stems_affixes.word_buile: construct[v.建设,建造,构造;创立]+ion表名词→n.建造,构造;建筑物,结构;释义,解释
de去掉,变坏+struct建立,结构→adj.破坏的 n.故意或有计划的破坏 v.破坏
destruct破坏+ion表名词→弄坏结构→破坏

stems_affixes.value_cn: 工业, 产业, 行业, 勤奋
stems_affixes.word_buile: indu=in+str=struct建立,结构+y→n.工业, 产业, 行业, 勤奋
instruct[v.教,教授;命令,指示]+ion表名词→n.教授;指导;[n.]用法说明[书],操作指南
instruct[v.教,教授;命令,指示]+or人→n.指导者,教员
in内+stru=struct建立,结构+ment物→内部构造→仪器,工具
instrumental[adj.仪器的;器械的;乐器的;起作用的;有帮助的]+ity性质→n.手段
ob反+struct建立,结构→反建设→阻塞,阻碍
struct建立,结构+ure表名词→n.结构,构造;建筑物 v.构造,建造

stems_affixes.value_cn: 基础,下部结构,地下建筑
stems_affixes.word_buile: sub下面+struct建立,结构+ion表名词→建造在下面
super上面+structure结构→上面的结构→上层建筑
con共同+struct建立,结构→共同建立→建设,建造
de坏+stroy=struct建立,结构→v.破坏,摧毁,消灭
de去掉,变坏+struct建立,结构→adj.破坏的 n.故意或有计划的破坏 v.破坏
in进+struct建立,结构→把知识建立进去→指导,指示
ob反+struct建立,结构→反建设→阻塞,阻碍
re再+construct[v.建设,建造,构造;创立]→v.重建,再建;重现,再现
struct建立,结构+ure表名词→n.结构,构造;建筑物 v.构造,建造

Sentence.sentence: An enormous amount of energy and resources went into the construction of those houses.

Smith touches on construction methods, the revolutionary invention of the automatic lift, the practicalities of living in the sky and the likelihood that, as cities become more crowded, apartment living will become the norm.

But there is also time for brief diversions onto bizarre ground, such as a discussion of the skyscraper index (which holds that a boom in skyscraper construction is a foolproof sign of an imminent recession)
Receptionist in an attorney's office and a welder at a construction site.

means.word_mean: 建造, 建设; 建筑业

sentences.en: There are two new hotels under construction.
sentences.cn: 有两家新饭店正在兴建。

sentences.en: The building is a peculiarly shaped construction.
sentences.cn: 这是一栋造形独特的建筑物。

sentences.en: Please do not put a wrong construction on her action.
A learner's dictionary should give both the meanings of words and examples of the constructions in which they are used.
sentences.cn: 一本学生词典应该既提供词语的含义, 又举出应用这些词语的例子。

jushi.chinese: 大雪阻碍了建筑工程的进展。

jushi.english: Our economic construction is vivid with life.
jushi.chinese: 我们的经济建设生气勃勃。

jushi.english: We celebrated the construction of the reservoir.
